newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mitsubishi Gas bid-only after rating upgrade.
newsitem.headline: Mitsubishi Gas bid-only after rating upgrade.

text.p: Shares in Mitsubishi Gas Chemical Co Ltd were bid-only in Thursday morning trade, encouraged by an upward revision in its rating, brokers said.
At 0053 GMT, the shares were bid only at 470 yen after closing at 455 yen on Wednesday.

Nomura Research Institute Ltd upgraded Mitsubishi Gas Chemical to a "1" from its previous "2", market sources said earlier. In its three-grade rating system, Nomura Research assigns a "1" rating to issues whose values it expects will outperform the key 225-share Nikkei average by more than 10 percentage points over the following six months.
